name: Mediterranean Chicken & Broccoli
preparation: Drain liquid from artichokes and sundried tomatoes. Chop tomatoes into smaller pieces.

In large bowl, place artichokes, tomatoes, chicken, broccoli, and seasoning; stir to combine and place in Rectangular Steamer. Cover and microwave on high for 5 min or until broccoli is tender and chicken is cooked through.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with Rosemary Garlic Steamer Potatoes for a complete dinner for two!

products.name: Italian Seasoning
summary: A robust Italian blend perfect for pizza, bread dough, pasta or flatbreads.

products.name: Rectangular Steamer
summary: Easy to clean. Easy to serve. Rectangular, silicone steamer is perfect for side dishes & desserts.
